arts.ttl: Scotland concede 13 seconds after break to go three down against Greece
arts.sum: Scotland concede in the opening seconds of the second half as Christos Tzolis puts Greece three goals up at Hampden and 3-1 ahead on aggregate in the Nations League play-off.

arts.ttl: Was 'embarrassing night' just a 'bump in road' for Scotland?
arts.sum: Midfielder John McGinn says Scotland let themselves down on "an embarrassing night", while head coach Steve Clarke wants a strong response to the "bump in the road" of the Nations League play-off defeat to Greece.

arts.ttl: Scotland stare down 8 game World Cup 2026 gauntlet as Denmark lie in wait for warp speed battle royale
arts.sum: World Cup qualifying is already underway for some teams as Steve Clarke looks to guide the national side back to a World Cup

arts.ttl: Was 'embarrassing night' just a 'bump in road' for Scotland?
arts.sum: Midfielder John McGinn says Scotland let themselves down on "an embarrassing night", while head coach Steve Clarke wants a strong response after the "bump in the road" of the 3-0 Nations League play-off defeat to Greece.

arts.ttl: Scotland must react after Greece 'set marker' - Clarke
arts.sum: Head coach Steve Clarke has demanded a reaction from his players after Greece "set a marker" for their upcoming World Cup qualifiers by outclassing Scotland in their Nations League play-off.

arts.ttl: 'A return to Scotland's worst of times under Clarke'
arts.sum: Scotland's alarming defeat by Greece in the Nations League play-off leaves head coach Steve Clarke with much to ponder, writes Tom English.

arts.ttl: Scotland 0-3 Greece: Tartan Army shocked in Nations League relegation
arts.sum: Home fans boo on miserable night for Steve Clarkeâ€™s side

arts.ttl: 'Sobering night' for Scotland - what now for Clarke and squad?
arts.sum: Sky Sports' Gordon Duncan gives the verdict on Scotland's 3-0 loss to Greece that resulted in the Tartan Army being relegated from the top tier of the Nations League.

arts.ttl: Off the Ball after Scotland lose to Greece
arts.sum: The most petty and ill-informed football show on radio.

arts.ttl: Scotland boo boys go unheard as big hitter hears something else during Hampden horror show
arts.sum: The Hampden crowd made their thoughts very clear after the Scots were torn apart by Greece
